articles.title: NASA, ESA Choose Astronauts for SpaceX Crew-3 Mission to Space Station - NASA
articles.description: NASA and ESA (European Space Agency) have selected three astronauts to serve as crew members for NASA’s SpaceX Crew-3 mission to the International Space Station, which is expected to launch in the fall of 2021.
